member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression
member.summary: Performs Geographically Weighted Regression (GWR), a local form of linear regression used to model spatially varying relationships.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The feature class containing the dependent and independent variables. (In, Required)
The numeric field containing values for what you are trying to model. (In, Required)
A list of fields representing independent explanatory variables in your regression model. (In, Required)
The output feature class to receive dependent variable estimates and residuals. (Out, Required)
Specifies if the kernel is constructed as a fixed distance, or if it is allowed to vary in extent as a function of feature density. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.in_features
member.summary: The feature class containing the dependent and independent variables. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.dependent_field
member.summary: The numeric field containing values for what you are trying to model. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.explanatory_field
member.summary: A list of fields representing independent explanatory variables in your regression model. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.out_featureclass
member.summary: The output feature class to receive dependent variable estimates and residuals. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.kernel_type
member.summary: Specifies if the kernel is constructed as a fixed distance, or if it is allowed to vary in extent as a function of feature density. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.number_of_neighbors
member.summary: An integer reflecting the exact number of neighbors to include in the local bandwidth of the Gaussian kernel whenever the kernel type is ADAPTIVE and the bandwidth method is BANDWIDTH PARAMETER. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.weight_field
member.summary: The numeric field containing a spatial weighting for individual features. This weight field allows some features to be more important in the model calibration process than others. Primarily useful when the number of samples taken at different locations varies, values for the dependent and independent variables are averaged, and places with more samples are more reliable (should be weighted higher). If you have an average of 25 different samples for one location, but an average of only 2 samples for another location, you can use the number of samples as your weight field so that locations with more samples have a larger influence on model calibration that locations with few samples. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.cell_size
member.summary: The cell size (a number) or reference to the cell size (a pathname to a raster dataset) to use when creating the coefficient rasters. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.in_prediction_locations
member.summary: A feature class containing features representing locations where estimates should be computed. Each feature in this dataset should contain values for all of the explanatory variables specified; the dependent variable for these features will be estimated using the model calibrated for the input feature class data. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.prediction_explanatory_field
member.summary: A list of fields representing explanatory variables in the Prediction Locations feature class. These field names should be provided in the same order (a one-to-one correspondance) as those listed for the input feature class Explanatory variables parameter. If no prediction explanatory variables are given, the output prediction feature class will only contain computed coefficient values for each prediction location. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SpatialStatisticsTools.GeographicallyWeightedRegression.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.
